channel.title: The_Assassin47's SECOND TRAILER
channel.description:
Hey Black Mesa.
About 3 years ago I made a Black Mesa Fan Teaser that was distinct in its sad, dramatic themes. (You can find that older video here [url='https://youtu.be/d80zKt8q3y8']https://youtu.be/d80zKt8q3y8[/url])) Im not really a video guy, just a tech guy, so I just use Windows Movie Maker. Here we are now in 2011, and I felt like making a trailer today, so I did. Dusted of WMM, and here we are.
Everyone complains that with the official footage you cant make a good trailer remix cause everyone has done it a million times, but thats all I know how to do. Its my second ever video, please let me know how I did. [b][url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UNXBTGJ9-T4']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UNXBTGJ9-T4[/url][/SIZE][/b]
As the first scene is not from official footage, an alternate cut is available with the opening scene changed. [url]https://youtu.be/eFpPNqnpw6g[/url]
Please comment!

item.title: The_Assassin47's SECOND TRAILER
item.dc:creator: Ry_amp_955_n
item.description:
I thought your edit of kazioo’s trailer was better, honestly. but this one you made wasn’t that bad. Music was just very unfitting.

Read full topic

item.title: The_Assassin47's SECOND TRAILER
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
I’m sorry, but that was pretty terrible. Why bother making more videos using the same footage from the 2009 trailer if it’s been done hundreds of times already? And yeah, that music really didn’t fit at all. At least your old video had more of a sad tone to reflect the whole incident, this music felt like it was for a dancing or racing game or something.

Read full topic

item.description:
The music is so unfitting to Half-Life, it makes me want to vomit.

item.title: The_Assassin47's SECOND TRAILER
item.dc:creator: The_Assassin47
item.description:
Hey Black Mesa.

About 3 years ago I made a Black Mesa Fan Teaser that was distinct in its sad, dramatic themes. (You can find that older video here https://youtu.be/d80zKt8q3y8))
Im not really a video guy, just a tech guy, so I just use Windows Movie Maker. Here we are now in 2011, and I felt like making a trailer today, so I did. Dusted of WMM, and here we are.

Everyone complains that with the official footage you cant make a good trailer remix cause everyone has done it a million times, but thats all I know how to do. Its my second ever video, please let me know how I did.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UNXBTGJ9-T4[/SIZE]

As the first scene is not from official footage, an alternate cut is available with the opening scene changed.
https://youtu.be/eFpPNqnpw6g

Please comment!

Read full topic
